channel.title: Need help with Yell

item.title: Need help with Yell
item.dc:creator: @i_am_thehate i am thehate
item.description:
@i_am_thehate wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:4, topic:418999"] if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { if (playerCommand.length() >= 6) { c.sendMessage("The message you entered is to short!"); return; } String Title = "[Player] "; if (playerRights == #) Title = "[] "; yell(Title + playerName + ": " + playerCommand.substring(5)); } } }[/quote]

Thats not what i meant, i meant that i would have liked to enable and disable with Eyell = enable yell and Dyell = disable yell

Im using a different source now…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


and it will not let normal players yell… so if i could change it to allow normal players to post, and then disable and enable yell with the 2 commands that would be very very helpful!
Thanks in advanced
I Am Thehate

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Yell
item.dc:creator: @i_am_thehate i am thehate
item.description:
@i_am_thehate wrote:

Hey guys,
I am trying to add a enable and disable function to my yell…
here is what I have so far

	[code]} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
                    if(muted == 1)
                    sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                    else
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
	}
	} else if (command.startsWith("dyell") && playerRights >= 1);
        yell ("Yell has been disabled");
        yell = false;
    }
	} else if (command.startsWith("eyell") && playerRights >= 1);
        yell ("Yell has been enabled");
        yell = true;
    }[/code]

it is showing no compiler errors
yet will not work…
Any idea’s?

Thanks in advanced

I Am Thehate

Read full topic
